title: Private Furnished Studio w/ Kitchenette
posting_body: In need of short- to mid-term housing?
New job?
Looking for an option without a year long lease commitment.
Downsizing?
Moving to the Bay Area and exploring options before committing to a neighborhood long-term?
This large furnished master bedroom with private entrance includes bathroom w/ double sinks and large shower, small kitchenette w/ mini fridge, 2-burner stovetop, coffee maker, microwave, etc.
Private entrance is in the back of home, from small deck patio space.
There are no shared spaces--just one shared wall.
Also have small deck space and yard.
Very comfortable for 1 person, less so for 2, especially if you working from home full-time.
Location is near downtown San Mateo, CalTrain, 92 and 101.
Very walkable neighborhood.
The space is all new/remodeled and has high-end furnishings.
Hardwood floors.
Tile and glass shower.
Black out curtains and honeycomb blinds.
New king size Tuft and Needle mattress; West Elm / CB2 / Pottery Barn furnishings.
There is a private entrance and small outside deck space w/ patio table.
Living space is NOT shared w/ the main house.
You have a completely self-contained studio.
ALL Utilities, Wi-Fi, TV w/ Roku included.
We are open to a 2-4 month lease to start (will consider 6 depending on situation) and will consider extending at that point if it is working for both sides.
Ideally 1 person, but will consider a couple for increased rent.
We are respectful of your privacy, but occasionally may offer fresh baked goods or BBQ.
Unit will be cleaned and sanitized, and empty prior to rental.
Available starting September 1 (possibly a bit earlier if needed--please inquire).
Room will be available for tours starting 8/21.
We are fully vaccinated and boosted, but willing to wear masks, and social distance for your comfort and safety.
$2,100 deposit and 1st month rent due at signing.
Location is near downtown San Mateo.
Must provide proof of current income/ability to pay rent.
No pets.
No smoking.
We do have a small dog who spends most of his time inside with us, but he does hang on our side of the deck/yard.
He is very friendly, but will not be allowed in your space.
